foreignData.name: Die Toten erwecken
foreignData.text:
Wirke Die Toten erwecken nur während des Kampfes im Zug eines Gegners.
Bringe X Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück. Opfere diese Kreaturen zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments.

foreignData.name: Despertar a los muertos
foreignData.text:
Lanza Despertar a los muertos solo durante el combate en el turno de un oponente.
Regresa X cartas de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla. Sacrifica esas criaturas al comienzo del próximo paso final.

foreignData.name: Éveil des morts
foreignData.text:
Ne lancez l'Éveil des morts que pendant le combat pendant le tour d'un adversaire.
Renvoyez sur le champ de bataille X cartes de créature ciblées depuis votre cimetière. Sacrifiez ces créatures au début de la prochaine étape de fin.

foreignData.name: Risvegliare i Morti
foreignData.text:
Lancia Risvegliare i Morti solo durante il combattimento nel turno di un avversario.
Rimetti sul campo di battaglia X carte creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero. Sacrifica quelle creature all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.

foreignData.name: 死者起こし
foreignData.text:
死者起こしは対戦相手のターンの戦闘中にのみ唱えられる。
あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードＸ枚を対象とし、それらを戦場に戻す。次の終了ステップの開始時に、それらのクリーチャーを生け贄に捧げる。

foreignData.name: 唤醒亡者
foreignData.text:
只能于对手回合的战斗中施放唤醒亡者。
将X张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。在下一个结束步骤开始时，牺牲这些生物。

name: Wake the Dead
originalText:
Cast Wake the Dead only during combat on an opponent's turn.
Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: The delayed triggered ability that makes you sacrifice the creatures will trigger only once. If you don’t sacrifice one or more of those creatures at that time (perhaps because another player gained control of them), the ability won’t try to make you sacrifice them on future turns.

text:
Cast this spell only during combat on an opponent's turn.
Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step.
